goal: Developing and publishing a self-service-web portal for project-specific software for end customers
requirements: REST interface to ERP system to provide software based on accounting projects followed by invoice triggering
Automatic user creation and management with authentication and authorization
Generation of installation guides based on Markdown
Automatic guidance of the user to solve problems to avoid installation errors and reduce support costs
tasks: Coordination between different stakeholders such as customers, delivery, sales and support
Creating UX designs and running usability tests
Collecting and clarifying requirements & adding them to backlog
Creating data model and software architecture
Implementing frontend, backend & REST interface based on JSON
Moderating, coordinating and leading through reviews
